title: Migration Strategy
body_html:
Migration Strategy (Standalone â†’ Integrated)

Goals

  • Zero data loss
  • Minimal downtime
  • Observable cutover

Steps

  1. Enable integrated plugin in shadow mode (disabled deliveries)
  2. Compare event counts/types vs standalone
  3. Enable integrated deliveries for a subset of webhooks
  4. Monitor metrics & logs; fix discrepancies
  5. Gradually migrate all webhooks
  6. Decommission standalone or keep as fallback

Replay

  • Provide API to replay failed deliveries by deliveryId
  • Optional backfill window using stored transactions
